pools.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this pool?
pools.error_volume_invalid: Volume must be a valid number
pools.no_pools: No pools registered. Add one to start!
analysis.title: AI Pool Analysis
analysis.observation_hint: E.g., It rained yesterday, water is green...
analysis.photo_instruction: Please take a clear photo of the pool water surface.
analysis.result_intro: Here is the analysis based on your parameters:
analysis.safety_warning: ⚠️ CAUTION: Never mix chemical products directly. Always handle pool chemicals with care and wear appropriate safety gear.
analysis.water_balanced: Your water parameters look balanced! Maintain current maintenance routine.
analysis.ph_low: pH is low (Acidic). This can cause corrosion and eye irritation.
analysis.ph_high: pH is high (Basic). This reduces chlorine effectiveness and can cause scaling.
analysis.ph_ideal: pH is within the ideal range.
analysis.chlorine_low: Chlorine is low. Limits sanitization capability.
analysis.chlorine_high: Chlorine is high. Wait before swimming.
analysis.chlorine_ideal: Chlorine is within the ideal range.
analysis.alkalinity_low: Alkalinity is low. Can cause pH instability.
analysis.alkalinity_high: Alkalinity is high. Can make pH difficult to adjust.
analysis.cyanuric_high: Cyanuric Acid is too high. Chlorine effectiveness is locked.
analysis.rec_ph_up: Add pH Increaser (Soda Ash) to raise pH.
analysis.rec_ph_down: Add pH Decreaser (Muriatic Acid or Sodium Bisulfate) to lower pH.
analysis.rec_chlorine_shock: Shock the pool with chlorine to raise levels.
analysis.rec_wait_chlorine: Allow sunlight to lower chlorine levels naturally or drain some water.
analysis.rec_alkalinity_down: Add pH Decreaser to lower alkalinity (and pH).
analysis.rec_drain_water: Partially drain and refill the pool to lower Cyanuric Acid.
analysis.error_required_fields: pH and Chlorine are required for analysis.
analysis.image_result_clear: Based on the image analysis, the water appears clear with good transparency. No visible algae or suspended particles detected.
analysis.image_result_green: Based on the image analysis, the water appears green. This indicates presence of algae.
analysis.image_result_muddy: Based on the image analysis, the water appears muddy or dirty. This indicates suspended solids or dirt.
